ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', RecordType.Name == 'Reseller GPP 3.0', Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Maintenance', OR( NOT(OR( Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Authorized - Accreditation In Progress', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Nokia Brand of Service', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Co-Branded', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Partner Branded', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Authorized', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Basic', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Premium', Text(Accreditation_Level__c) = 'Professional' ) ), NOT(OR( Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Authorized - Accreditation In Progress', Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Nokia Brand of Service', Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Co-Branded', Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Partner Branded', Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Authorized', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Basic', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Premium', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Professional', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Custom', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'NBOS', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = 'Nokia Brand of Service AED', Text(Pricing_Level_Override__c) = '' ) ) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: Authorized - Accreditation In Progress, Nokia Brand of Service, Co-Branded ,Partner Branded, Authorized, Basic, Professional, Premium,Custom,Nokia Brand of Service AED
